articles.author: Jim Teece
articles.description:
Creating a strategic plan for a small company is essential for ensuring that your business stays focused, grows sustainably, and adapts to changing conditions. Here’s a straightforward process that’s both practical and adaptable for small businesses: 1. Set the Foundation (Preparation) 2. Analyze the Current State (Where Are You Now?) 3. Set Clear Strategic Goals…
The post Keep your small business focused with a strategic plan appeared first on Southern Oregon Business Journal.
articles.title: Keep your small business focused with a strategic plan
